IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WE EMPOWER INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES TO LIVE HEALTHIER LIVES. THROUGH ENGAGEMENT IN OUR COLLABORATIVE APPROACH TO BEHAVIORAL HEALTH, PHYSICAL, AND SUBSTANCE USE SERVICES, INDIVIDUALS EXPERIENCE HOPE AND LIVE A FULFILLING LIFE AFTER DIAGNOSIS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WE EMPOWER INDIVIDUALS AND FAMILIES TO LIVE HEALTHIER LIVES. THROUGH ENGAGEMENT IN OUR COLLABORATIVE APPROACH TO BEHAVIORAL HEALTH, PHYSICAL, AND SUBSTANCE USE SERVICES, INDIVIDUALS EXPERIENCE HOPE AND LIVE A FULFILLING LIFE AFTER DIAGNOSIS.
IRS990.Desc: MENTAL HEALTH COOPERATIVE, INC. (MHC) PROVIDES INDIVIDUALS, LIVING AT OR BELOW THE POVERTY LEVEL, WITH ACCESS TO MENTAL HEALTH SERVICES THROUGH COMMUNITY-BASED CARE MANAGEMENT AND OUTREACH SERVICES, MOBILE CRISIS RESPONSE/EMERGENCY PSYCHIATRIC SERVICES, PSYCHOTHERAPY, PSYCHIATRIC CLINIC, PRIMARY CARE AND CLINICAL EVALUATION. MHC DELIVERS THESE SERVICES THROUGH AN INTEGRATED CARE APPROACH THAT FOCUSES ON BOTH THE BEHAVIORAL HEALTH NEEDS AND THE PHYSICAL HEALTH NEEDS OF THE INDIVIDUAL. MHC SERVES ADULTS WITH SEVERE MENTAL ILLNESS AND CHILDREN WITH SERIOUS EMOTIONAL CHALLENGES WITH LOCATIONS ACROSS MIDDLE AND EAST TENNESSEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENGAGED AN UNAFFILIATED ORGANIZATION TO PROVIDE CONVENTIONAL LOBBYING, MEDIA RELATIONS, AND COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT/COALITION BUILDING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AFTER THE 990 IS PREPARED BY INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS, THE CFO AND THE CONTROLLER DO A DETAILED REVIEW. UPON APPROVAL BY THE CFO AND THE CONTROLLER, THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD DESIGNATED FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR FINAL APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A QUESTIONNAIRE DEALING WITH CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS TO BE COMPLETED ANNUALLY BY ALL EMPLOYEES COVERED BY THE SCOPE OF THIS POLICY AS A CONTINUING REMINDER AND CONTROL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HR COLLECTS COMPARABLE DATA FROM SIMILARLY SITUATED ORGANIZATIONS, BOTH TAXABLE AND TAX-EXEMPT, FOR FUNCTIONALLY COMPARABLE POSITIONS IN THE GEOGRAPHIC AREA OF THE ORGANIZATION. HR ALSO CHECKS WITH LOCAL RECRUITING FIRMS FOR WAGE COMPARABILITY OF ADMINISTRATIVE AND CLERICAL POSITIONS. THIS INFORMATION IS USED TO DETERMINE THE COMPENSATION OF NEWLY HIRED OFFICERS, KEY EMPLOYEES AND STAFF. MHC HIRES AN OUTSIDE FIRM TO ANALYZE EXECUTIVE STAFF'S COMPENSATION BI-ANNUALLY. IT IS THEN PRESENTED TO THE BOARD FOR APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AUDIT AND FORM 990 ARE PUBLIC DOCUMENTS MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
